title: Stock Futures, Oil Rise on Hopes of Milder Covid Variant
sub_head: Bitcoin stabilizes after plummeting over weekend
body:
U.S. stock futures rose on early indicators that Omicron may be causing milder illness than previously feared, while bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies edged up from weekend lows.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 climbed 0.5% Monday, suggesting the broad-market index may regain some ground, after closing down 0.8% Friday. Dow Jones Industrial Average futures added 0.7%, while Nasdaq-100 futures edged up 0.2%.
